question: What is ComfyUI-YOLO?
answer: ComfyUI-YOLO is an Ultralytics-powered object recognition custom node for ComfyUI.

question: How can I install ComfyUI-YOLO?
answer: To install ComfyUI-YOLO, navigate to the custom/nodes directory in your ComfyUI installation and run the command: git clone https://github.com/kadirnar/ComfyUI-YOLO

question: Where can I find models for ComfyUI-YOLO?
answer: You can find models for ComfyUI-YOLO on the Ultralytics Model Hub at https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases

question: How can I download a model from the Ultralytics Model Hub for ComfyUI-YOLO?
answer: To download a model from the Ultralytics Model Hub for ComfyUI-YOLO, navigate to the models/ultralytics directory and run the command: wget https://github.com/ultralytics/assets/releases/download/v8.2.0/model_name.pt

question: What types of object recognition tasks can ComfyUI-YOLO perform?
answer: ComfyUI-YOLO can perform object detection, video object detection, object segmentation, and object pose estimation using Ultralytics models.

question: Does ComfyUI-YOLO provide any image resizing functionality?
answer: Yes, ComfyUI-YOLO includes an Ultralytics Resize Image node that allows resizing of images.

question: Is there a way to visualize bounding boxes with ComfyUI-YOLO?
answer: Yes, ComfyUI-YOLO includes an Ultralytics Bbox Visualization node that provides bounding box visualization.
